summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) waiver form used to inform an employee that they are being asked to provide information voluntarily as part of an investigation. The form includes warnings about the voluntary nature of the interview and the potential use of statements in future proceedings. The specific subject of the investigation is redacted.
keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The form states the interview is voluntary and no disciplinary action will be taken if the employee chooses not to answer questions.
Any statement provided may be used as evidence in future criminal or agency disciplinary proceedings.
The specific subject of the OIG investigation is redacted in the provided text.
